releaseNotes: Enhanced UI Testing Framework & Settings Navigation - Implemented comprehensive UI testing framework with UITestHelperMixin - Fixed settings navigation crash by adding missing CelebrationManager environment object - Added automated test workflow with test-with-tmp.sh script - Improved test reliability with proper UserDefaults clearing between test runs - Enhanced project guidelines with testing best practices and iPhone 16 simulator usage - Added robust popup handling for release notes during UI tests - Implemented auto-commit functionality for successful test runs - Improved settings page accessibility and navigation flow - Enhanced overall app stability and user experience
